game.title: Aquarius's Tears
game.objective: Retrieve the sacred tears of the water goddess, Aquarius.
game.description: The village of Aquaria is in dire need of water. The only hope is to retrieve the sacred tears of Aquarius, the water goddess, from the Fountain of Tears in the Cursed Forest.
game.reward: A magical rainstorm that will fill the village's reservoir, securing the water supply for generations to come.

task.description: The Fountain of Tears is heavily guarded by magical creatures, so be prepared for danger.
Find a bowl to collect Aquarius's tears and bring it back carefully. Do not let it touch the ground.

task.objective: Return the tears to the mayor
task.description: Bring Aquarius's tears to the mayor of Aquaria. They will know best how to restore the village's water supply.
